title: Topic 004 Question 078
body: You have an Azure Sentinel workspace.
You need to create a playbook.
Which two triggers will start the playbook? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
options: An Azure Sentinel scheduled query rule is executed.
An Azure Sentinel data connector is added.
An Azure Sentinel alert is generated.
An Azure Sentinel hunting query result is returned.
An Azure Sentinel incident is created.
